sub_title: Senior Project Manager at Philips Innovation Engineering
summary:
Product development executive with 30 years of experience in international project- and product management, innovation and product development. Over 20 years of experience in the medical device industry. MSc in Industrial Design Engineering.

Characteristics:
  - Development minded, focus on creating and directing product- and process innovations.
  - Leadership in multidisciplinary teams, results driven coaching management style.
  - Analytic pragmatic approach, reducing complexity.
  - Focus on smart solutions that really make a difference for company, users and communities.

Areas of expertise:
  - Project management.
  - Process development and implementation.
  - Product management. 
  - Defining, driving and managing product innovations.
  - Global market introduction of new products.
  - Product validation and clinical evaluation, including usability testing.
  - Managing small teams.

Specialties: Innovation, portfolio management, project management, product development, product management, product validation, process improvement, coaching.

profile_positions.description: Innovation Project- and Program Management for the Philips businesses
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager @ Philips I&S Innovation Engineering

profile_positions.description: Project- and Program management for medical innovation projects: exploration, advanced development and product development.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager @ Philips Research

profile_positions.description:
Key achievements:
  - Responsible for the positioning, definition, validation and global launch of a high-range transport ventilator on time and within budget, resulting in market clearances in 65 countries within the first week of release, and above-budget sales.
  - Managing the definition, validation and launch of a mid-range transport ventilator, resulting in a reduced time-to-market of 1 year.
  - Initiating, defining and rolling out new working modes for product validation.


Responsibilities:
  - Responsible for definition, development, global market introduction and boosting of several new medical devices. Tasks include:
      - Monitor and analyze global market data and competition.
      - Responsible for product positioning and targeting, definition of product characteristics, alignment with global sales regions.
      - Responsible for product validation and product documentation.
      - Responsible for market introduction strategy and roll-out.
      - Management of project related marketing materials.
      - Running product related International Marketing Conferences.
      - Member of “fuzzy-front-end” project for definition of new product generation. 
      - Chairman of Clinical Engineering Board, member of international product validation process board.
      - Coaching of junior team members.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key achievements:
  - Managing an international multi-disciplinary project team resulting in the development and release of the first "advanced" Homecare ventilator within Dräger Medical.
  - Development and implementation of new Global Innovation Process for Dräger Medical, to align all product development efforts internationally, member of 5 person international core team.

Responsibilities:
  - Full project responsibility for medical device development: quality, budget and planning, project from concept phase until scaling-up of production.
  - Managing development teams of 12 cross-functional team members, total team appr. 40 employees, project budgets up to 4 M€, direct reporting to management team.
  - Development and implementation of new Global Innovation Process for Dräger Medical.
  - Restructuring and implementation of development process to fulfill FDA standards (GMP) for enabling export to USA.
  - Coaching of junior team members.
profile_positions.title: Senior Projectmanager Product development

profile_positions.description:
- Management of an 8 employee product innovation group that focused on product optimization of products: cost reduction, lifecycle stretching. Based on tools as Quality Function Deployment, Design for Assembly, etc.
  - Responsible for group profit.
  - Responsible for department strategy and acquisition.
  - Coordinator “Product development Medical Technology”: Business development to create a new service within TNO Industry; responsible for networking, technology-, services- and marketing development.
profile_positions.title: Manager department Product Optimization

profile_positions.description: Project manager for a wide range of third-party developments of complex products.
profile_positions.title: Project manager Product development
